title: DASH Mini Toaster Oven Cooker for Bread, Bagels, Cookies, Pizza, Paninis & More with Baking Tray, Rack, Auto Shut Off Feature - Red
description: The Dash Mini Toaster Oven is perfect for cooking with limited counter space. Make single slices of toast, bagels, mini-pizzas, even cookies! The cute and compact Mini Toaster Oven includes a removable baking tray, oven rack, and crumb tray for easy cleaning. Great for a dorm room or camper / RV, this Mini Toaster Oven is a convenient solution for making quick snacks.
